column5: Got skunked again......   Now, i'm not sure what I doing wrong...poor timing....etc...but i went out the other day, picked up a trout rod and thought that I would give roe and berkley trout worms a try...nothin...  Maybe it's just Bronte....   So I think i'll try another river...  Anyone have suggestions?  Dave
Trout are scared of cops. Quit the force and you will be blessed with many fish.
Cut back on the amount of pepper spray attractant!

If you enjoy fly fishing you can try elora gorge, there is some nice browns swimming in there. You can also try Credit or Humber river, they are not as far from Kitchener as some other places. I`ve never fished neither one of those rivers for trout so i cant really help you with specific areas. Sorry
Hey if you wanna hit the upper Credit with me on Friday morning -afternoon , I'll go with ya!  Small fish, but very pretty and usually willing to bite.
Bring the SWAT Team with you and surround them!
I'm in, shoot me a pm with directions
That would be the end of Chief Wiggum as we know.
c'mon now, that's going too far! lol.....
alright, my brother in law is a cop in Durham and all he eats is bagles, is there a connection?
Yup, they're round and have holes.
LOL...this thread is hilarious.  Hopefully you get out with Johnnyb and you get into a fish or two!  Good luck out there!
